title: Oil Edges Lower With Iran and Trump’s Greenland Threat in Focus
description: Oil fell as tensions over Iran cooled and wider markets carried a risk-off tone with President Donald Trump’s push to take over Greenland.
content: Oil fell as tensions over Iran cooled and wider markets carried a risk-off tone with President Donald Trump’s push to take over Greenland.
